___responsibleParty.description: A reference to the party that performed the action on the resource. This could be the username of the User who performed the action. This could also be a reference to the party (e.g. Organization) that accessed the API endpoint to perform the action on the resource.

___action.description: The action being performed in the activity (e.g. CREATED, UPDATED, DELETED, ARCHIVED, etc.).

___relatedResources.description: An array of references to resources also related to this activity.

$eref.description: A reference to a resource, including it's ID, type, and a link to retrieve the resource.
$eref.title: resourceReference

___link.description: A link for accessing the resource.
___link.title: URL Link

___type.description: Specifies the type for the referenced resource.
